---
title: "pol2cart"
---


```
x, y = pol2cart(theta, rho; deg=false)
```

Transform polar to Cartesian coordinates. Angles are in radians by default. Use `deg=true` if angles are in degrees. Input can be scalar, vectors or matrices.


## Methods

```julia

```
